main event: Two soldiers observed a white, baseball-like object that turned red while flying slowly above the treetops at Camp Hood, Texas, on April 23-28, 1949.
interesting points: The object was first sighted on April 23 and observed several times until April 28,The object changed colors from white to red and green,Multiple witnesses, including soldiers on guard duty, reported seeing the object,The sightings lasted from a few seconds to several minutes, The object was described as maneuvering in a low arc before disappearing behind trees.
sighted object: a white, baseball-like object that turned red
witness description: Soldiers on guard duty with varying levels of observation skills.
